title: Fey, the War Dancer
body:
Dancing stance: Her animations are changed to resemble, obviously, a dance. While she is moving and standing still..

_Passive_
Momentum: Autoattacks add a stack of momentum, with a maximum of five. Each stack of momentum adds extra damage according to level. You cannot add stacks while dancing. The stacks disappear after 10 seconds.

_Q_
Dance: Jumps to a target dealing 50/85/115/150/185(+50% AP) (+100% AD) physical damage and entering a dancing stance for three seconds. Using this ability expends a stack of momentum, reducing the CD to .5 seconds.
Also adds a stack of harmony for 2.5 seconds. CD: 8, Mana: 35

_W_
Take a Bow: Expends all stacks of harmony to heal for 20/25/30/35/40% of damage dealt per stack caused in the last 10 seconds and gaining a 20% speed boost per stack for 2 seconds. CD: 18, Mana: 60/70/80/90/100

_E_
Inspire: Sarea and all nearby allies gain a 20/30/40/50/60%(+5% per 50 AP) speed boost for 2 seconds. If Sarea has stacks of harmony, the speed boost is instead equal to (20/30/40/50/60%(+5% per 50 AP) + 10% per stack) and spending all of the stacks.

_R_
Prepare!/Perform!: For the next 5 seconds, hitting an enemy forms a tether between Sarea and the target. Hitting another target tethers that target to the next and so on. While tethered, enemies suffer (40/75/110 damage + 5% AP) damage per second.
Sarea can choose to activate again or wait for the 5 seconds to end to activate _Perform!_. Once _Perform!_ is activated, Sarea becomes untargetable and travels along the tether stunning enemies hit along the way for 1 second
and dealing (100/200/300 + (60% AP)(100% AD to tethered targets. Hitting champions grants stacks of harmony and momentum. CD: 100/90/80, Mana: 100

Playing as:
Build up momentum stacks otherwise _Dance_ will go on Cooldown and your attacks won't hurt as much
Use _Take a Bow_ to escape from combat after using _Dance_
Inspire grants a large speed boost to allies, use it to help them chase or escape
_Prepare!_ works against all enemies with the exception of buildings
_Dance_ towards foes and then attack them. Reset your harmony stacks before they disapear

Playing against:
Don't let her build stacks off minions for free. Once she uses _Dance_ she can't build more _Momentum_ for 3 seconds
_Perform!_ will activate so long as she is alive no matter what after 5 five seconds
_Take a Bow_ will win her trades, however she can only heal with it after using _Dance_ and _Perform!_ and the stacks only last 2.5 seconds

Generally, I'd say put her in the jungle. She has sustain and _Dance_ to deal with the creeps in there along with utility provided by _Inspire_. Obviously, _Dance_ is good for ganking opponents and sticking onto them.
